revised_title: Stratifications and Dark Band in Electrical Discharges in Torricellian Vacua
tldr: The author investigates the phenomenon of stratifications and dark bands in electrical discharges in Torricellian vacua using an inductive coil. The experiments reveal that the conditions necessary for the appearance of these phenomena include a perfect vacuum, the absorption of moisture, and the introduction of vapor from naphtha or phosphorus.
